Package com.googlecode.batchfb.impl

Class Summary
Batch Everything that can be done in a single Batch request.
ErrorDetectingWrapper Detects a Facebook error in the JSON result from a Graph API request and throws the correct kind of exception, whatever that happens to be.
GraphNodeExtractor Knows how to get the JsonNode for a particular graph request out of a batchResult.
MapperWrapper<T> Wrapper that converts from a JsonNode to an actual Java object.
MultiqueryRequest Aggregates a set of queries into a single multiquery.
PagedLaterAdapter<T> Provides paging ability
QueryNodeExtractor Knows how to get the JsonNode for a particular query request out of a multiquery.
